name: Escape From The Underworld (MoonlightDagger, CavenaghiFrancisco)
description:
Try escaping the Underworld in this Endless Runner, embody Eurydice in her journey to escape death itself!

Instructions:

Download the zip

Unzip it

Execute the app

Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to enter Shadowstep making you invincible for a brief time

Collect as many Drachmas as you can! Wine makes you vision double that means more Drachmas! Avoid the SoulFires and keep running!
